import qs from"qs";import*as axiosHelper from"./api_helper";export const fetchHighKlines=async _ref=>{let{payload}=_ref;const data=await axiosHelper.get("/kline/all?".concat(qs.stringify(payload)));if(data.isError){return data;}return data.result;};export const fetchOHLCV=async _ref2=>{let{payload}=_ref2;const data=await axiosHelper.get("/kline?".concat(qs.stringify(payload)));if(data.isError){return data;}// chart accepts kline times in secs
data.result.data.map(kline=>{kline.time/=1000;});return data.result;};
